rules.content: Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.
When ~ enters, if you control six or more lands, create a 4/4 green Rabbit creature token.
{i}Landfall{/i} {-} Whenever a land you control enters, if you control six or more lands, create a 4/4 green Rabbit creature token.
